Posts.Title: Surgery Tomorrow!! jhunnicutt36 pfitz1130

Posts.Content: jhunnicutt36 wrote: Ok..I've had an ultrasound at my dr.office just on the axilla area because of lump in armpit..radiologist said that I have a solid anechoic mass measuring 12 mm.Benign nodules and cysts.After that appt i noticed an idention on the curve of my left breast.Had a mammo and sonogram that didnt show anything in the left breast except on one film from the mammo,and a lump in my right breast.Radiologist brushed the dimple off.I have an appt with a breast surgeon on the 12th.Im so worried that he wont take all this seriously.I now have a few smaller dimples underneath the larger one.What questions can I ask?What can be done to determine the reason for the dimpling.Oh,also the shape is changing and the tips of my nipples are red.Plz help.Im scared and confused.I dont have much faith in the breast center because ofÂ  the radiologist. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Need help preparing for appt with Breast Surgeon jhunnicutt36 jhunnicutt36

Posts.Content: jhunnicutt36 wrote: I found a lump in my armpit a few weeks ago.Everyone agrees that its just a cyst but a week ago I noticed an indention on the curve for my left breast.I had a mammogram and a sonogram but the radiologist says that nothings there.I know in my heart that somethings wrong.I cant have an MRI necause i have an internal defibbrilator.Im only 36.What do I do? Posts.Title: I dont feel confident in radiologist jhunnicutt36 jhunnicutt36

Posts.Content: jhunnicutt36 wrote: Well the breast suegean couldnt feel a lump to explain the indention or dimpling in my breast so I will be getting a call with the date to have a biopsy..ty to everyone that responded with love!I at least feel better that it's being looked at further. Posts.Title: Excisional biopsy jhunnicutt36 jhunnicutt36

Posts.Content: jhunnicutt36 wrote: I see a surgical oncologist July 12th at the same breast center that I had my mammogram and sonogram.I have an indention on the curve of my left breast that showed so suddenly.The radiologist said in his report that the cyst under my armpit was nothing and that my mammo was negative.Told me that it was normal breast changes and that he wanted to see me in 6 months to chk a lump in my right breast.The nurse told my primary care dr.that the report was misleading bcause they did see something on the mammo but couldnt be certain of what it was.This is all so crazy. to me.Why would he lie?Now I'm scared to death that they are going to miss something.My fiance is retired army of 14 years.He's supportive but he just doesnt understand.He tells me to stop worrying.Easier said that done!Friends and family care but nobody wants to talk about this or even begins to understand.Not only this but on the 11th I hve to hve my cervix scraped bcause of precancerous cells that showed on my pap.I'm a strong woman,i've lost a kidney and survived a viral infection that damaged my heart but this is just too much.I feel like everyone is watching me and expecting me to handle this like a champ but right now I just want to break down.i want to be allowed to cry.I feel so silly because so many women on here are just amazing to me.The strength that you all have is unbelievable! I feel so weak.I just dont know if I can mentally do this and if I can what abt my heart?how much can it take? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Cant get this terrible feeling to go away. jhunnicutt36 jhunnicutt36
